content.text:
Thank you for asking for help with your weekly review. I'd be happy to assist you. Let's go through your requests one by one:

1. Feedback on recent meals:
I've checked the current tasks, and there doesn't seem to be any specific feedback on recent meals. As requested, I've created a new task to remind you to offer feedback tomorrow. The task details are:

Task Name: Provide Meal Feedback
Due Date: 2023-09-18
Details: Offer feedback on recent meals to help improve future meal plans

2. To-do list and overdue items:
I've reviewed the open tasks, and here's what I found:

- Sunday Meal Planning and Shopping (Due: 2024-09-29)
- Sunday Meal Prep (Due: 2024-09-29)
- Weekday Dinner Preparation (Due: 2024-09-30)
- Weekly Meal Plan Review (Due: 2024-10-06)

None of these tasks appear to be overdue at the moment, so there's no need to alert the team about any overdue items.

3. New content on the site:
I'm sorry, but I don't have access to your website or any new content that might have been added. To check for new and interesting content, you'll need to review the site yourself or use a tool specifically designed for that purpose.

4. Summary of what's been done and what needs attention:

What's been done:
- Created a reminder task for providing meal feedback

What needs attention:
- The upcoming Sunday Meal Planning and Shopping task (Due: 2024-09-29)
- The Sunday Meal Prep task (Due: 2024-09-29)
- Providing feedback on recent meals (new task for tomorrow)

To keep the team informed, I'll send an email summarizing this information.

input.message:
Hello team,

Here's a quick update on our meal planning and tasks:

1. New task: We've added a reminder to provide feedback on recent meals tomorrow (2023-09-18). Your input will help improve our future meal plans.

2. Upcoming tasks:
   - Sunday Meal Planning and Shopping (Due: 2024-09-29)
   - Sunday Meal Prep (Due: 2024-09-29)
   - Weekday Dinner Preparation (Due: 2024-09-30)
   - Weekly Meal Plan Review (Due: 2024-10-06)

3. Good news: There are currently no overdue tasks!

Please take some time to think about our recent meals and be ready to provide feedback tomorrow. This will help us continually improve our meal planning process.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Your Meal Planning Assistant
